# sage-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                       | Type                             | Default     |
| --------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `bgColor` | `bg-color` | Determines the background color of the card.      | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `border`  | `border`   | Determines whether the card should have a border. | `boolean`                        | `true`      |
| `padding` | `padding`  | Sets the padding size for the card.               | `"md" \| "none" \| "sm"`         | `'md'`      |
| `shadow`  | `shadow`   | Determines the shadow size for the card.          | `"lg" \| "md" \| "none" \| "sm"` | `'none'`    |
